entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-01-29
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • System.Text.Json Source Generator with TreatWarningsAsErrors Fails #64499
  • HttpClient fails to initialize SSL. #64492
  • TextElements result changed in .NET6.0 #64489
  • System.Security work planned for .NET 7 #64488
    7.0.0
  • System.Console work planned for .NET 7 #64487
    7.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Adding overloading FileStream.FlushAsync(bool flushToDisk) #64485
  • Test failure Loader\\classloader\\RefFields\\Validate\\Validate.cmd #64484
  • debuggertests.harnesstests.debuggertests.harnesstests.exceptionthrown #64483

Closed

  • [API Proposal]: GetValueOrDefaultReference<T> for Nullable<T> #64491
  • dotnet 6 rc.2: libhostpolicy.dylib library load disallowed by system policy #60760
  • [Blazor WebAssembly] Support for Cancelling HTTP Requests by Diposing Response Stream #64225
    7.0.0
  • Mono incorrectly handles conversion of negative doubles to nint #64386
    7.0.0
  • [OSX/Linux][arm64] Assertion failed 'addOp2Type != TYP_BYREF && addOp2Type != TYP_REF' #64417
  • JIT rolling build can build and upload non-JIT changes #64392
    7.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Add support for `TYP_BYREF` `LCL_FLD`s to VN #64501
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Don't use Targets* helper properties in project properties #64500
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Introduce `GenTreeDebugOperKind` #64498
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • NativeAOT: Guarded devirtualization #64497
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Permit longer chain building fetching for dynamic revocation tests #64496
    area-System.Security, test enhancement, community-contribution
  • Fix UnobservedTaskException on Http2's SendPingAsync #64494
    area-System.Net.Http, community-contribution
  • [draft][wasm] InvokeJSFunctionByName alternate design #64493
    NO REVIEW, arch-wasm, new-api-needs-documentation, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 7.0.0
  • Local heap optimizations on Arm64 #64481
    arch-arm64, area-CodeGen-coreclr

Merged

  • Use const enums in typescript since regular enums generate extremely bad code #64486
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript
  • [wasm] Cancel pending ReadableStream on Dispose or cancelationToken #64285
    arch-wasm, area-System.Net.Http, 7.0.0
  • Remove command-line arguments from Main methods in ILPROJ projects #64482
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Remove CheckForOverflowUnderflow #63825
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution
  • [mono] Fix r8->i conversion on amd64. #64467
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Temporarily disable test Runtime_60035 failing with Crossgen2 #64420
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • JIT: fix x86 codegen issue #64476
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • More cleanups in assembly loader area #63157
    area-AssemblyLoader-coreclr
  • Fix JIT rolling build issue with non-JIT changes #64480
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

Updated

  • [mono] Optimize generic sharing for generic methods. #64129
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • JIT: simple forward substitution pass #63720
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • emit branchless form of (i >= 0 && j >= 0)/(i!=0&& j!= 0) for signed integers #62689
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Fold inbox crypto into one assembly #64307
    area-System.Security
  • [wasm][debugger] Rebind invalid breakpoints after receiving an update in that source file #64462
    area-Debugger-mono
  • issue-22928 Add ImmutableArray Span-based APIs #61196
    area-System.Collections, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • ARM64: Avoid jump stubs where possible #64148
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [tests][eventpipe] Port over minimal code from Dotnet/Diagnostics to enable eventpipe tests on Android #64358
    area-Tracing-coreclr
  • [wasm][debugger] Fixing race condition #64394
    area-Debugger-mono
  • Fix layout and GCInfo for ByRef fields. #64422
    area-TypeSystem-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Add array-fast path in Enumerable.Min/Max(int/long) #64470
    area-System.Linq, tenet-performance, 7.0.0
  • Set language specific flags appropriately in mono #64454
    area-Build-mono, community-contribution
  • Move DllImportGenerator to use DisableRuntimeMarshalling for its blittable classification #64279
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • Fix Issue #21678: Add Path.Exists -- to replace inefficient FileExists || DirectoryExists #64347
    area-System.IO, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Implement operator delete on ThreadStressLog #64478
    area-VM-coreclr
  • SPMI no ASMDiff between Checked and Release #61335
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, needs-author-action, 7.0.0
  • Add Android Maui Startup testing #64121
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Fix generic method resolution in composite R2R images #64247
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Add S.S.C.Cose with COSE Sign1 support #64461
    area-System.Security, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • Move FabricBot generation scripts to dotnet/runtime #64324
    area-Meta
  • [release/6.0] [mono] Fix downcast check in Array.CopySlow #64479
    Servicing-consider, area-CoreLib-mono
  • Add vectorized paths for Span<T>.Reverse #64412
    area-System.Memory, community-contribution

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-01-29
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • [Linux] Don't use dot folder comply by XDG Base Directory Specification #10390
    Backlog
  • `dotnet run` cannot run the project due to `System.ArgumentOutOfRangeException: startIndex cannot be larger than length of string. (Parameter 'startIndex')` exception #23148

Updated

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-01-29
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Nullability analysis could be improved after ReferenceEquals checks #59157
  • VS2019 and VS2022 Roslyn / SDK incompatible #59156
  • CS8604 when checking 'is not null'. No error when checking '!= null' #59152

Closed

  • Inconsistent behavior with dynamic and void returning functions #59132

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix issue link #59158
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Revert "Update StreamJsonRpc" #59154
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Update publish data for 17.1 #59153
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Merge release/dev17.1-vs-deps to main #59150
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge

Merged

  • Merge release/dev17.1 to release/dev17.1-vs-deps #59155
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Revert "Correctly handle additional inputs to user-defined conversions" #59148
    Area-Compilers
  • Merge main to features/RawStringLiterals #59151
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Update prerelease version for 17.1 Preview 5 #59127
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Merge release/dev17.1 to release/dev17.1-vs-deps #59149
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge

Updated

  • Merge main to features/vs2022-theme #59162
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Merge main to features/semi-auto-props #59161
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Enable feature lightup on json strings (classification, bracematching, diagnostics). #59034
    Area-IDE, Needs UX Triage
  • Add IL verification with ILVerify in addition to PEVerify #37994
    Area-Compilers, PR For Personal Review Only
  • [draft] VS 2022 new dark theme editor colors #58855
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Update incremental generator docs #58344
    Area-Compilers, Documentation, New Feature - Source Generators
  • Remove dependency on EditorFeatures from Remote.ServiceHub project - take 2 #59147
    Area-IDE
  • Support declaration and emit of `required` members in source #58507
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Required Members
  • ✨ Implement SegmentedHashSet<T> #54574
    Area-Compilers
  • Support Pattern Matching ReadOnlySpan<char> on constant string #44388
    Area-Compilers, Community, Compiler.Next
  • SignatureHelp: guess best overload for incomplete invocations #31843
    Area-IDE, Feature Request, Backlog
  • [Draft] Don't block completion for items from unimported namespaces #59045
    Area-IDE
  • Refactor ISyntaxInputNodes #58800
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Source Generators
  • Enable null on UseExplicitTypeCodeFixProvider #58866
    Area-IDE
  • CompletionService refactoring and small tweaks to import completion #59125
    Area-IDE

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-01-29
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Publish Blazor WASM application to Azure App service fails #39869
  • Perf regression: fortunes_dapper #39867
  • Error compiling release version in Xamarin UWP #39866
  • PageRemote attribute has a bug #39864
  • With .NET 7 SDK, the docs link should be updated when creating mvc/razor project in CLI #39862
  • Developers can easily work with JWT bearer authentication for API apps during development #39857
  • Async minimal route handlers don't serialize child members #39856
  • Simplify Authentication and Authorization configuration when using WebApplicationBuilder #39855
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Areas for Blazor #39854

Closed

  • Perf regression: json #39828
  • Non bubbled event from custom element doesn't reach the Blazor handler #39831
  • Review NPM distribution files #39829
  • Minimal Actions - array support in method signatures from querystring binding #32516
    17.1-Preview1
  • Minimal APIs doesn't support binding to StringValues from query or headers #36726
    17.1-Preview1
  • Missing fractional seconds of date-time in ModelBinding #37590
    .NET 7 Planning
  • .net Blazor markup "if" code compiles and executes dispite being bad written #39824

PullRequests

Created

  • Use ConfigureAwait(false) on ConnectionMultiplexerFactory #39865
    community-contribution
  • chore (codespaces) : Use latest omnisharp build #39861
    community-contribution
  • [release/6.0] [SignalR] Only minify .min.js files #39859
    area-signalr, 6.0.x
  • Consistently serialize child members returned from route handlers #39858
    area-runtime

Merged

  • Remove static char arrays #39863
    community-contribution, 7.0-preview1
  • Use non-generic TaskCompletionSource #39835
    area-mvc, area-runtime, area-signalr, area-blazor, community-contribution, 7.0-preview1
  • [SignalR] Only minify .min.js files #39842
    area-signalr, 7.0-preview1
  • Add dark mode for developer exception page #39676
    area-runtime, community-contribution, 7.0-preview1
  • Added support for arrays of types with TryParse, StringValues and string[] for query strings and headers #39809
    area-web-frameworks, 7.0-preview1
  • Fork component analyzers #39796
    area-blazor, 7.0-preview1
  • Do not upgrade warnings to errors in VS #39845
    area-infrastructure, 7.0-preview1

Updated

  • define RouteValuesAddress .ToString () #39753
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • [release/6.0] Don't reuse Pipe buffer when body is read #39376
    area-runtime, 6.0.x

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-01-29
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • WinUI AutoSizeInitializesCorrectly test is failing #4399
  • Merging ResourceDictionary from referenced assembly via pack://application leads to compilation error #4398
  • .NET MAUI iOS target publishing/archiving #4397
  • There is no way know whether a type implements Command and CommandParameter, request to consider abstracting them into an interface #4396

Closed

  • iOS and MacCatalyst MauiApplicationDelegate should derive from UIResponder #4390
  • MAUI + Azure Communication Services #3393
  • [Docs] How to publish #1831
  • When can we expect documentation on distribution to Appstore and google Playstore ? #3766
  • MAUI App iOS publishing problem #4271
  • [Enhancement] Serious Android and iOS Binding Generator #1347
  • [Bug] Cant compile a fresh macos project #1764
  • MauiAsset is transferred to wrong position or path is incorrect #4184

PullRequests

Created

  • Remove legacy TFMs #4403
  • [WinUI] Fix Alignment and Header Visibility #4400
    6.0.200-preview.13
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #4395
    t/housekeeping ♻︎

Merged

  • Switches to UIResponder for App/Scene delegates #4391

Updated

  • Add drag-drop item reordering to CollectionView #3767 #3768
    t/enhancement ☀️, area/collectionview 📃, 6.0.200-preview.13
  • Generate the Windows manifests as well #2704
    area/single project ☝️, platform/windows 🪟
  • Correctly register DependencyService entries #4385
    area/hosting 🧩, 6.0.200-preview.13
